job1.title: Tech Team Lead - Web Platform Fullstack
job1.description: Leading web platform fullstack initiatives, driving OAuth implementation enhancements and partner onboarding experiences. Managing cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality, scalable fintech solutions.

job2.title: Lead Frontend Developer
job2.description: Led development of modern web applications using React, Next.js, TypeScript, and Node.js. Mentored junior developers and implemented best practices for code quality and performance. Built user-focused applications that translate designs into fast and interactive web experiences.

job3.title: Senior Frontend Engineer
job3.description: Developed and maintained high-performance web applications for fintech solutions. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver user-centric financial products, ensuring scalability and performance optimization.

job4.title: Software Engineering Lecturer
job4.description: Coaching and mentoring software engineering students, sharing practical insights from industry experience to help them develop job-ready skills in modern web development.

education.title: Education
education.degree: BSc in Information Technology (Information Security System)
education.school: Asia Pacific University of Technology & Innovation (APU)
